preRegConfirmation.subject: 🎉 You’re In! Pre-Registration Confirmed – {{course}}
preRegConfirmation.html:
Welcome to MD Technical School, {{firstName}}!

We’re thrilled you pre-registered for {{course}}. Your invoice is attached to this email.

Next up: our enrollment team will reach out with your onboarding steps, schedule, and learning platform access. If you’re ready to take care of tuition now, you can pay online or over the phone.

  • Financial Aid: https://climbcredit.com/apply/mdtechnical?page=create-account&schoolId=MD4644868617478
  • Contact Us at: (540) 455-2878
  • Questions? register@cybertraining4u.com

We can’t wait to help you level up your career. Let’s do this! 💪

Refunds and cancellations follow the published policy. Funding assistance may be available through Army, Air Force, MyCAA, WIOA, DARS, or other affiliates.
